Recommendations: a substitution mechanism to fill in the leaf of absencevacancies that occur during the school year to avoid interruption of class may be suggest
a clear and definite policy to fairly compensate faculty member conduct research and extension should be establish
observance of the exist guideline for teach load and number of preparation of faculty member to give way for quality instruction and other related task is recommend
the list of reference may be review to include book of recent edition currently available in the library
production of more material for quality instruction evaluate by the ims committee is want
for effective utilization of time schedule for other assignment such as research extension and consultation must be incorporate in each teacher program

for quality instruction and effective classroom management it is suggest that faculty load be in accordance with the program requirement
